short_summary: Request for Proposal for Network Security Analyst – Tier 1 – R126449
description: This requirement is open only to those TBIPS EN578-170432 Supply Arrangement Holders who qualified under Tier 1 for services in the National Capital Region for the following categories:".8 Network Security Analyst
tags: *World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)*
full_summary:
### TBIPS Request for Proposal – Tier 1 – R126449

#### Notice
Shared Services Canada is seeking qualified Suppliers for a TBIPS requirement – C.8 Network Security Analyst Category, to provide network security analysis services in the National Capital Region.

#### Period of Performance
This requirement will be for a period of two (2) years, with an estimated 220 days of work per resource.

#### Security Requirements
Minimum corporate security required: FSC – Secret, and Minimum resource security required: Secret.

#### Eligible Suppliers
Only TBIPS Supply Arrangement Holders who have qualified for Tier 1 services in the National Capital Region are eligible to respond to this requirement.

#### Selection Process
This is a Request for Proposal (RFP) process. The Contracting Authority will evaluate proposals based on the criteria outlined in the invitation.

#### Instructions to Applicants
Eligible Suppliers can submit a proposal by contacting the Contracting Authority, Dusan Adamov, phone: 613-294-2380, email:  [dusan.adamov@canada.ca](mailto:dusan.adamov@canada.ca). The RFP documents will be sent directly to the eligible Suppliers.

#### Important Notes
– The Crown retains the right to negotiate with any supplier on any procurement.
– Documents may be submitted in either official language.
– Task-Based Informatics Professional Services (TBIPS) Method of Supply is refreshed three (3) times per year.

#### Closing Date
The deadline for submitting proposals is 03 April 2023, at 14:00 Eastern Time.

#### Contact Information
Dusan Adamov
Contracting Authority
Phone: 613-294-2380
Email:  [dusan.adamov@canada.ca](mailto:dusan.adamov@canada.ca)   [1]
Address:
180 rue Kent St, Ottawa, ON K1G 4A8 *

#### Supporting Documentation
No supporting documentation is provided for this notice. * [2]

Note:
1: Due to restrictions on document sharing, the contact information is not directly accessible.
2: There are no attachments to this notice for the general public.
